spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 63 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Dealing Fire damage grants 111 Critical Strike for 12 sec. 
Dealing Frost damage grants 111 Mastery for 12 sec.
Dealing Nature damage grants 111 Haste for 12 sec.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Mastery by 496 for 15 sec. Bloodlust's duration is increased to 50 seconds on you, and Ancestral Resonance's chance to activate is greatly increased during Bloodlust.

name: Heart of Azeroth

main_spell_tooltip.description: The Heart of Azeroth erupts violently, dealing 172 Shadow damage to enemies within 12 yds. You gain 25% critical strike chance against the targets for 10 sec, and increases your critical hit damage by 25% for 5 sec.

passive_spell_tooltip.description:
Your critical strikes with spells and abilities grant a stack of Blood-Soaked, increasing Critical Strike by 1. Upon reaching 40 stacks, you gain 22 Haste for 8 sec.

Blood-Soaked has a 25% chance of only consuming 30 stacks.
When an ability fails to critically strike, you have a high chance to gain Reckless Force. When Reckless Force reaches 20 stacks, your critical strike is increased by 70% for 6 sec.

Your movement speed is increased by 5%, and when you move more than 25 yds within 4 sec, gain 8 Agility for 20 sec.

This can only occur once every 30 sec.

Reduces the cooldown of Feral Spirit by 10.0%, and increases your Versatility by 3.

When you activate Feral Spirit, immediately heal for 5% of maximum health.

spells.description: Equip: Harnesses the energy of raw Azerite, awakening exceptional pieces of armor that possess latent powers.

description: A living symbol of hope, borne by the champions of a dying planet. The fate of Azeroth will be shared by all her children.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant 58 critical strike rating for 5 sec. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

Dealing Fire damage grants 102 Critical Strike for 12 sec. 
Dealing Frost damage grants 102 Mastery for 12 sec.
Dealing Nature damage grants 102 Haste for 12 sec.

Your spells and abilities have a chance to increase your Mastery by 458 for 15 sec. Bloodlust's duration is increased to 50 seconds on you, and Ancestral Resonance's chance to activate is greatly increased during Bloodlust.

spells.description: Equip: Show off your truly epic brawling accomplishments.

spell_tooltip.description: Increases Item Level by 5 and increases the potency of all Azerite powers granted by this item.
Increases your movement speed by 28% of your highest secondary rating, up to 8%.
Your damaging abilities have a chance to grant you Elemental Whirl, increasing your Critical Strike, Haste, Mastery, or Versatility by 238 for 10 sec.

Dealing Fire damage grants 111 Critical Strike for 12 sec. 
Dealing Frost damage grants 111 Mastery for 12 sec.
Dealing Nature damage grants 111 Haste for 12 sec.
Your Stormbringer-empowered Stormstrikes deal 733 additional damage. Every 20 seconds, gain Stormbringer.

spell.description: Use: Increase your speed for a few seconds. (2 Min Cooldown)

name: Crafted Dreadful Gladiator's Sabatons of Cruelty

spells.description: Equip: Entering combat summons an orb of dark power to assist you.

Use: Shield an ally for up to 56,792 from a great distance and gain up to 6,788 Speed. The Absorb and Speed amounts vary depending on the distance between you and your target, with the Absorb increasing and the Speed decreasing the closer you are. (1 Min Cooldown)

spell.description: Use: Reduces your falling speed for 2 min. (3 Min Cooldown)

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Drape of the Skybreaker

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
